announcements.title: Weekly Contest

content.text: We are excited to announce this week's contest. Get ready to participate in various challenges and win amazing prizes!
Make sure to follow all the steps below to ensure your participation.

items: Submit your entry within the provided time frame.

steps.title: Step 1: Register
steps.description: Sign up for the contest on our official contest page.

steps.title: Step 2: Participate
steps.description: Complete all the challenges provided within the time limit.

steps.title: Step 3: Submit
steps.description: Submit your completed entry through the submission form before the deadline.

announcements.goodLuckMessage: Good luck to all participants! We can't wait to see your amazing entries.

announcements.title: New Features Announcement

content.text: We are thrilled to announce new features that will enhance your experience.

items: Improved user interface for easier navigation.
New dashboard for tracking your progress.
Personalized notifications based on your activity.

content.text: These features are designed to make your experience more enjoyable and productive.

steps.title: Step 1: Explore the Dashboard
steps.description: Check out the new features on your dashboard.

steps.title: Step 2: Customize Notifications
steps.description: Set up personalized notifications based on your interests.

announcements.goodLuckMessage: We hope you enjoy these new features! Let us know your feedback.
